Main pronunciation 主要发音: liǎn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning result.

English senses 英语理解: draw back, fold back; collect

Usage example 用法举例: 收斂 shōu liǎn (retrain oneself)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 2387

Shuowen 说文解字: 收也從攴僉聲

歛字的基本解释

歛
liǎn
古同“敛”，聚集。

歛
hān
欲念。
给予。

歛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎn］
［《廣韻》良冉切，上琰，來。］
［《廣韻》力驗切，去豔，來。］
亦作“歛1”。“敛1”的繁体字。亦作“襝1”。
(1)聚集。
(2)收获。
(3)征收，索取。
(4)赋税。
(5)收藏。
(6)指收购儲藏。
(7)约束，节制。
(8)不足。
(9)磨砺。
(10)收缩。
(11)犹还。
(12)通“殮”。给死者穿衣，入棺。
(13)通“瀲”。参见“斂斂”。
(14)姓。《姚秦录》有将军敛宪、敛方、敛岐，皆羌族首领。见《通志·氏族四》。
[②]［lián］
［《集韻》離鹽切，平鹽，來。］
“敛2”的繁体字。
见“斂2盂”。

歛字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　歛； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页572第23
【玉篇】【集韻】?呼濫切，蚶去聲。【博雅】欲也，予也。【廣韻】與?通。戲乞物也。　又【玉篇】【集韻】呼甘切【廣韻】呼談切，?音蚶。又【集韻】呼含切，音㟏。又丘凡切，音顩。義?同。　與斂別。

Basic explanation of words
Restrain
liǎn
Gu Tong "converges" and gathers.
Restrain

Desire.
give.
Restrain
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎn］
["Guang Yun" Liang Ran cut, Shang Yan, come. ]
["Guangyun" strives to test and cut, go to Yan, come. ]
Also known as "convergence 1". The traditional characters of "Lian 1". Also known as "裣1".
(1) Gathering.
(2) Harvest.
(3) Levy and claim.
(4) Taxation.
(5) Collection.
(6) Refers to purchase and storage.
(7) Restraint and restraint.
(8) Insufficient.
(9) Grinding.
(10) Shrinkage.
(11) Still still.
(12) Through "fun". Dress the deceased and put it in the coffin.
(13) Through "潋". See "convergence".
(14) Last name. In "Yao Qin Lu", there are generals who converge the constitution, converge the square, and converge on the Qi, all of whom are the leaders of the Qiang nationality. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
[②]［lián］
["Jiyun" cut from salt, flat salt, come. ]
Traditional characters for "Lian 2".
See "Grasping 2 盂".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Odd Words] 　 怀瀀; Kangxi strokes: 17;
[Jade articles] [Jiyun]? Huran cut, clams go. [Bo Ya] Desire, give also. [Guangyun] Connect with? Begging things too.　[Yu Pian] [Ji Yun] Hu Gan Qi [Guang Yun] Hu Tan Qi,? Yin Clam. Also [Jiyun] Huhanqie, sound 㟏. And Qiu Fanqie, the sound. Righteous? Same.　Farewell with convergence.
